name: La Mensajera
description:
/In Selk'nam mythology, in the beginning there was matriarchy. The women were led by Moon, and dominated the men, disguising themselves as spirits to terrorize them and maintain control over them./

Among them were the goddess of the underworld Xalpen, and her messenger sister Tanu, who wore an outfit with paintings representing the 4 heavens. One day, Sun discovered the secret of the women, and the men decided to kill them all, except the little girls who did not know the secret. Moon escaped to the heavens, where she is pursued by Sun for the rest of eternity. 

3D GIF where Tanu, one of the main characters of the Selk'nam myth of Krren and Kreeh (Sun and Moon) is shown escaping to the skies from the vengeance of men, together with Luna. 

𝘍𝘭𝘰𝘱𝘢 (@𝘧𝘭𝘰𝘱𝘢𝘭𝘢𝘯𝘥) 𝘧𝘰𝘳 𝘵𝘩𝘦 '𝘖𝘶𝘳 𝘔𝘺𝘵𝘩𝘴' 𝘦𝘹𝘩𝘪𝘣𝘪𝘵𝘪𝘰𝘯 𝘩𝘦𝘭𝘥 𝘣𝘺 𝘵𝘩𝘦 𝘊𝘏𝘌𝘕 𝘢𝘳𝘵𝘪𝘴𝘵 𝘤𝘰𝘭𝘭𝘦𝘤𝘵𝘪𝘷𝘦
